title: Play and Punishment
description: Abused as a child by his human father, the young werewolf, Brody, is now a member of Cathal Clan. While in Britain with fellow pack members, Brody ends up on his own in the town of Southport. On a search for food, he inadvertantly wanders into a BDSM club and learns the meaning of Play and Punishment.
author: Tadgh Faolan
